alert.note: Alert for Lyon; Plymouth; Sioux (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 2:00AM CDT until May 30 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lyon County in northwestern Iowa... Sioux County in northwestern Iowa... Northern Plymouth County in northwestern Iowa... Eastern Lincoln County in southeastern South Dakota... Northeastern Union County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 245 AM CDT. * At 200 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sioux Falls to near Newton Hills State Park to near Union Grove State Park, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Canton and Lake Alvin State Recreation Area around 205 AM CDT. Larchwood and Fairview around 210 AM CDT. Inwood around 215 AM CDT. Rock Valley, Hudson and Alvord around 220 AM CDT. Ireton, Doon and Lester around 225 AM CDT. Rock Rapids and Maurice around 230 AM CDT. Sioux Center and George around 235 AM CDT. Orange City, Hull and Alton around 240 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Chatsworth. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for southeastern South Dakota. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for southeastern South Dakota.
